content.location: This problem is the first problem on this boulder, which is on the right across from Spirit problem.

content.description: Start with double underclings. Make a long move to sloping edge, to a horizontal then top out.
content.location: Left of Bombedil, center of this face.

content.description:
The Stranger is an underrated, incredibly fun problem with excellent movement and hold variety. Start on low chickenhead jugs and pop right to a good sloper. Match. Switch feet on an excellent rail under the start, then move up to a dish. Bump left to a water groove, then, squeezing this, get your feet up for the final bump to a jug. Top out on amazing jugs, and reflect on the fact that despite its diminutive size and low difficulty, you may have just climbed the most fun boulder problem ever.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2f1fgmMniE
content.location: In the Spirit boulder area, just right of Spirit problem.

content.description: Sit start on jugs, low. Grasp weird sloper and gun up to a sloper in worn water groove. Set feet and shoot for small crimper on the right side of the arete and bump up to good crimper to the top jug.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fadv2d9NsHo
content.location: Left side of the spirit boulder. This is a prominent boulder on the left past Permanent Scream.

content.description:
Sit start on jug. climb face just right of arete.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_NpLxBXB_hE
Start on underclings, then work yer way to slopers, then a long move gets you to a good edge just right of the crack and finish with crack.
content.location: On the right just left of Killough Face past the tree.

content.description: Start in the widest part of the horizontal crack. Top out with long reach or opt right then up.
content.location: Go through the little corridor past Interact and you'll see the boulder on the right.

content.description: Stand start. Good start ledge. Move up through face with crimpers.
content.protection: a couple of pads and a competent spotter.
content.location: between Permanent Scream and Killough crack.

climbs.name: Killough Crack, aka, Kianna's Way Out

content.description: Work up into crack via shelf on the right. Straight forward crack climbing with some hidden holds inside.
content.protection: A couple of pad's & good spotter/ allthough its a pretty easy problem, theres a shelf that protrudes out at the bottom. So, if you come off, keep that in mind.
content.location: On the right, before Permenant Scream. Tall obvious crack.

content.description: Sit start on jugs and climb face.
Start on undercling and sloper. Make long moves to seam, then climb face to finish.
Sit start on jugs. Climb up the right side of arete using slopey crimpers then through jugs to finish.
Sit start. climb short arete with a couple of sloping holds to a groove sidepull on yer right.
content.location: On arete left of HP Whorehouse

content.description: Sit start. climb face to top out on continous jug.
content.location: Directly behind Cullmano, on opposite boulder.

content.description:
SDS on prominent knobs. Work into undercling then move up on sharp crimps and sidepulls left of the arete.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jJji5SHpJvo
content.location: On the boulder directly across from Spirit and The Stranger. Start at the knobby looking protrusions close to the the right corner.

content.description: Lie-on-your-back sit start and mantle. Strictly no high balling allowed in the park.Right leg up for V3-4Left leg up for V2Or what grades do you think? V0 both?Short little rock with a sloped top.
content.protection: Thin pad or dirt on your back
content.location: This is a short sitting rock to the climber's right of the spirit problem.

content.description: Down walk way past Front area/Ten Pins.
